__e: She came to do the ironing. She saw them all on the staircase, Marie
We have a Lift, wheelchair accessible rooms, WIFI, and an iron and fax (on request).
Guests can use ironing service, tour assistance and laundry as well as parking and a baggage storage.
Orange Grove Hotel offers a budget accommodation in Sydney. It features laundry and ironing service as well as free parking, a designated smoking place and an ATM.
